Html:
Hi,

I love D3 but I'm afraid to use since it doesn't seem like an active project. There hasn't been a release since April 2009 and last source code change was in December 2009.

Will this project be supported or is it dead (I hope not!)?

Thanks in advance

Hello, there is some kind of slackening in D3 at codeplex. But internally we continue working on it. Please don't think that D3 is dead.

 

Best regards,

Mikhail

Hi,

Thanks for the good news! I'll be anxiously waiting for the updates.

Thanks again

Don't bother anxiously waiting, I just got this response to my latest question:

Hi,

I'm no longer working on this project, so I suppose that there will be some time (several months) during which there will be nobody to answer at this forum.

Best regards,

Mikhail.

Maybe I was not very accurate with the time, and probably will find a person to answer at these discussions forum earlier.

Mikhail.
Also, D3 != me, there are other developers, so please don't worry.

Also, D3 != me, there are other developers, so please don't worry.
=> You mainly wrote the first versions of this project... Excellent work. Thanks again.

Kamel



2010/6/17 Thecentury <notifications@codeplex.com>

From: Thecentury

Also, D3 != me, there are other developers, so please don't worry.

And thank you, Kamel, for your interest to me and your answers on D3's discussions.
